description.value:
The Consultation Note is generated by a request from a clinician for an opinion or advice from another clinician. Consultations may involve face-to-face time with the patient or may fall under the auspices of telemedicine visits. Consultations may occur while the patient is inpatient or ambulatory. The Consultation Note should also be used to summarize an Emergency Room or Urgent Care encounter.
A Consultation Note includes the reason for the referral, history of present illness, physical examination, and decision-making components (Assessment and Plan).

definition.value: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] C-CDA on FHIR In Fulfillment Of Order (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/StructureDefinition/CCDA-on-FHIR-In-Fulfillment-Of-Order) (CONF:2219-2477).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ConsultDocumentType http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.31 DYNAMIC (CONF:2219-1320).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter (CONF:2219-1363).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] section (CONF:2219-1286) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1263) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1290).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1291).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1292).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core AllergyIntolerance Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance) (CONF:2219-2234). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2235). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] FamilyMemberHistory (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory) (CONF:2219-2237). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2238). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Immunization Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-immunization) (CONF:2219-2239). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Procedure Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-procedure) (CONF:2219-2241). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core SmokingStatus Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-smokingstatus) (CONF:2219-2242). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core VitalSigns Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-vitalsigns) (CONF:2219-2243).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1272) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1317).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10164-2" History of Present Illness (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1318).
